title: News creators help publishers get back in the ring
description: Very early lessons in boxing include learning a basic stance, step-drag footwork, proper punching form, and blocking for defense. It also involves quickly reading what sorts of punches are being thrown at you. Let’s count the punches that journalism took this year. The first is that while generative AI innovation moved at a blinding pace...
